name: CMCalibratedMagneticField
desc: Calibrated magnetic field data and an estimate of the accuracy of the calibration.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes the magnetic field to a set of default values.

items.name: init(field: CMMagneticField, accuracy: CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy)
items.desc: Initializes the magnetic field to the specified set of values.

items.name: var field: CMMagneticField
items.desc: A structure containing 3-axis calibrated magnetic field data. See the description of the CMMagneticField structure.

items.name: var accuracy: CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy
items.desc: An enum-constant value that indicates the accuracy of the magnetic field estimate. See CMMagneticFieldCalibrationAccuracy.
